title: Treasure Hunt
short_description: Learn about select works and enjoy an array of fun activities as you visit five stops within the museum’s galleries.
list_description: ﻿Learn about select works and enjoy an array of fun activities as you visit five stops within the museum’s galleries.
description:
Explore the galleries and create a kaleidoscope of art at this family favorite program. Engage in fun activities and learn all about select works as you visit five stops located across the museum’s galleries.

On your kaleidoscope experience, you might encounter:

  • Apes monkeying around to a concerto, sonata, or a rock song 
  • Mountains peeking high above the clouds
  • A puzzle of jewels from a crown fit for royalty
  • Aquatic plants and creatures hidden beneath the water’s surface

Treasure Hunt sparks a love of art in the children and families that join us, reveals the best of the collection, and provides attendees with a new vocabulary to talk about art and creativity. 

Treasure Hunt Tickets

Choose your start time. Please note that this ticket option does not include lunch.

Treasure Hunt and Lunch Tickets

Choose your start time.

Questions? Please contact the office of the Auxiliary Board at auxiliaryboard@artic.edu.

This event is hosted by the Auxiliary Board of the Art Institute of Chicago. @AuxiliaryboardoftheAIC
buy_button_caption:
$40 per person (Treasure Hunt only)
$75 with lunch
Free for children under 2
